Подробное описание

A progress bar element using a value between 0 and 1.

Автор
Gauthier Billot

Конструктор(ы)

◆ ElementProgressBar()

ElementProgressBar::ElementProgressBar ( const Rocket::Core::String &  tag)

Constructs a new ElementProgressBar. This should not be called directly; use the Factory instead.

Аргументы
[in]tagThe tag the element was declared as in RML.

Методы

The value of the progress bar.
